      • createPattern

        public java.lang.String createPattern(int fromI,
                             int fromJ,
                             int toI,
                             int toJ)
                               throws DimensionException
        Create a regular expression for the line between selected positions.
        Parameters:
        fromI - Start point's vertical position.
        fromJ - Start point's horizontal position.
        toI - End point's vertical position.
        toJ - End point's horizontal position.
        Returns:
        Searched pattern.
        Throws:
        DimensionException - Throw if the line is not horizontal and not vertical.
